QuestData.Title: Holding the Line
QuestData.Description: Auchindoun is under attack!$B$BThe Auchenai are valiant warriors in their own right, but they cannot hold against these endless demon hordes alone. We came here to stop the Legion from engulfing Draenor... working together is our best shot.$B$BI need you to thin out the demons' numbers so we can regroup our forces safely and push forward into the Burning Front.$B$BWe will stop their march here and now!
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay $1oa demons in the Burning Front.
QuestData.RewardText: Your valor will give our men reprieve as they work to contain the threat completely. Well done.
